casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tony Robert JONES 669P03-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016.

Mr. Tony Robert Jones, Pro Per.

Ms. Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. Tom Horner, District Attorney, For State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of November 2016 by Defendant for Petition to Show Just Cause Under Common Law:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
